title: Fragment, 1858
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave.
dimensions: Warp: 59 cm [23"] Cut top and bottom. Total weft: 69 cm [27.5"] There is a narrow piece [.5 cm wide] of the same fabric seamed to the left side. Cut all 4 weft edges.
description: Flowers on trellises separating groups of people dancing and children playing. Brown and red with a tan background on undyed fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1858.
1858. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave.. Gift of Ariel Holdsworth. 1994-94-1.
